net.codemusic.smartears
Interface IAnswer

All Superinterfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicAnswer
public interface IAnswer
extends java.awt.event.ActionListener

This interface represents an answer that can be played and which the user must identify or otherwise answer

Method Summary
 void acceptSoundEngineVisitor(ISoundEngineVisitor v, java.lang.Object param)
          A Visitor Design Pattern method that accepts a Visitor from a Sound Engine to negotiate playback for this IAnswer
 void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
          Called when the user has guessed this answer.
 java.lang.String getAbbreviation()
          This accessor method returns the abbreviated name for this answer
 net.codemusic.Strategy getDefaultAlreadyCorrectStrategy()
          This accessor method returns a basic strategy for what to do when an answer is chosen after the example has been correctly identified
 net.codemusic.Strategy getDefaultCorrectStrategy()
          This accessor method returns a basic strategy for correctly identified answers
 net.codemusic.Strategy getDefaultIncorrectStrategy()
          This accessor method returns a basic strategy for incorrectly identified answers
 java.lang.String getName()
          This accessor method returns the full technical name for this answer
 int getSpan()
          Returns the number of half steps from the lowest note to the highest note in this answer.
 int getValue()
          Returns an int specifying how many points this answer is worth.

getValue

public int getValue()
Returns an int specifying how many points this answer is worth.

actionPerformed

public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
Called when the user has guessed this answer. This method executes the guess strategy that can be set using the setGuessStrategy method.

Specified by:
actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
See Also:
setGuessStrategy(Strategy)

setGuessStrategy

public void setGuessStrategy(net.codemusic.Strategy s)
This accessor method sets the strategy that this answer will use when its actionPerformed method is called.

getSpan

public int getSpan()
Returns the number of half steps from the lowest note to the highest note in this answer.

setSpan

public void setSpan(int span)
Sets the number of half steps from the lowest note to the highest note in this answer. Nota bene that the programmer is responsible for making sure this number is accurate
